item.title: How to backup, offline, or archive a git repo
item.description:
I’m not sure why this isn’t really covered simply in one place but here it goes…

Using just the cli you can do the following:

FYI: the git archive command is not the thing we want, that is more for prepping code for deployment to a siteâ€¦

What we really want is to offline or backup the repo

The idea is:

  • git clone --mirror <repository_url>

    • which results in a dir <repository_url>.git/

  • cd <repository_url>.git/
